channel.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
channel.description: I know this might seem like a situational change but it could help a lot, for example when someone is up to you (a drunk that debs you, for example) and you chill them and manage to convince people to hang them, only to have "GET X HE IS THE REAPER, I WAS CHILLED" in their logs.

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I will eventually be a possssor and go into a observers body and become a king… then destroy everyoneo

Read full topic
item.source: Make chilled people unable to write in logs

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The class card if everything I just mentioned was added btw:

Reaper

Neutral Killer

Passive 1: Consume Soul - If you are attacked consume a soul to self heal. You start with 2 souls.
Passive 2: Royal Blood - You may step up to become king.

Day Ability 1: Chill - Prevent target player from voting, speaking or using day Ability’s for the rest of the day. (2 souls per)
Day Ability 2: Dying Whispers - Edit the reaped players logs. (1 soul)

Night Ability 1: Reap - Kill target player and take their soul. Bypasses Healing. They will appear alive until the next night. You will see their class and logs. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Gather Darkness - Kill target player and take their soul. Bypasses Healing and Death immunity. You will be occupy and redirect immune tonight. They will appear alive until the next night. You will see their class and logs. (2 souls)

Read full topic

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Btw the current Reaper rework we had been pushing can deal with the problem just fine by throwing souls at it.

N3: Debed
D4: Chill Drunk
N4: Gather Darkness reap Drunk
D5: Edit yourself out of the drunks logs.

Read full topic

That way people will be more paranoid about Psycho King.

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
NightX:
  1. Make Reaper not notify people when they are attacked.

WHY AM I IN THE DEAD CHAT???

People would be really confused upon realising they’re dead.

Read full topic
item.source: Make chilled people unable to write in logs

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
We really do need to solve the Reaper-Drunk problem. I think there’s 2 solutions:

  1. Make Reaper occupy immune
  2. Make Reaper not notify people when they are attacked.

I think #2 is more interesting.

Read full topic
item.source: Make chilled people unable to write in logs

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
1. Get Debauched

  2. Claim you Debauched the Drunk and was attacked.

  3. Drunk flips.

  4. Die.

Read full topic
item.source: Make chilled people unable to write in logs

item.title: Make chilled people unable to write in logs
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
1. Get Debauched N1

  2. Chill Drunk

  3. Drunk debauches you again

  4. Drunk outs you as you have no souls left

Or he’ll just keep debauching you until you finally do run out of souls.

Read full topic
